resources.string: You have made some changes. Do you want to upload them instead of discard?
Some or all data was not uploaded. Try uploading again later if this was only a temporary problem.
%1$s \nhas local version %2$s \nand was deleted on the server
%1$s \nwas deleted locally \nbut has references on the server
If you are using OAuth this is likely a bug, please send a problem report, if you are using login and password (not recommended) please check that they are entered correctly.
Could not connect to the OSM-Server. Please check your Internet connection or try again later.
Could not connect to the OSM-Server because https negotiation failed. Try switching to a non-encrypted connection in the API preferences.
If you are using OAuth you should re-authenticate and then retry, if you are using login and password (not recommended) please check that they are entered correctly.
The data you are trying to download contains data that conflicts with your edits. Please try to upload your data first before retrying.
The area selected fails to conform to the API restrictions, please choose a different one.
The API is currently offline and does not allow data to be retrieved or written.
Vespucci has run out of memory loading the requested data. Please restart and try loading a smaller area.
Vespucci has run out of memory loading the requested data. Please attempt to save your edits, restart and try loading a smaller area.
Vespucci received invalid data from the server. If you believe that what you were trying to do is correct, please file a bug report.
The file contained invalid data. If you believe that what you were trying to do is correct, please file a bug report.
Could not write to selected file.

Thank you for using Vespucci.

To get started you need to know two things:

* tapping the lock icon in the upper left corner will switch between locked (no editing) and unlocked mode

* to add a new object: long press, tapping in the same place will add a node, tapping further away will start a way.

Do not forget to download the area you want to edit.

Have fun!
Welcome to a new version of Vespucci!
This is a new version of Vespucci with new features and behaviour. It would be best to quickly read the on device upgrade information.
Loading your account on openstreetmap.org for OAuth authorisation…
You have unsaved changes that will be discarded if you proceed.
This suggestion can replace some tag values with more popular values.
You already have existing track data. You may want to cancel and save first.
Really delete all tags for object \"%1$s\"?
This operation affects filtered attached objects!
The changed object is connected to hidden elements that will change too.
OK continue to show this message
You have not changed anything yet…
You have unsaved changes, please upload them first.
Please zoom in to edit (Volume Up/Down or Lens/Shift)
You cannot edit outside of the downloaded area
Please zoom in to add a bug (Volume Up/Down or Lens/Shift)
You reversed a oneway street or a way with direction dependent tags. Please check the tags and correct if necessary.
You merged elements that have conflicting tag values, direction dependent semantics or different roles in the same relation. Please check the tags and roles and correct if necessary.
You are trying to merge elements that have conflicting tag values. Please check the tags and correct first before retrying.
Too many nodes in way to move
You have %1$s unread mail(s) on the OpenStreetMap server
Download failed, probably because the area selected was too large.
Download failed with error code %1$d, message %2$s
Road has no name or ref
Please allow OAuth access to your OSM account and then retry the upload.
Please allow OAuth access to your OSM account.
No OAuth configuration available for current API, please set login and password.
OAuth is not enabled for the current API.
Timeout during authentication handshake, please retry.
Communication error during authentication handshake, please retry.
Longitude must be within -180°/+180°, latitude within -85°/85°
Saving the current state failed!\nThis a fatal error, trying to write an export file for later recovery with JOSM.
You are editing outside of the downloaded data.
Inconsistent state detected, please send in the error report!
%1$s is not writeable by Vespucci.\nThis may be a permissions or technical issue with your device.
The system did not return a suitable location for the tile database.
At least one preset has to be selected!
At least one geocoder has to be selected!
Corrupted state file, used backup file!
Corrupted bug state file, used backup file!
Map tile database or disk full!\nExit, delete database or make more space available.
Are you sure you want to exit?
Type or tap for name suggestions
Please insert decimal formatted coordinates (eg. "52.333572","8.741185"). Lat has to lay between -85.0 and +85.0, and Lon has to lay between -175.0 and +175.0.
The way is tagged with attributes that are direction dependent and cannot be reversed. Reversing the way will break the tagging.
You are about to delete a way.\n\nYou can either keep all nodes, or delete nodes that only belong to this way and do not have any tags.
You are about to delete a way that is a member of one or more relations. Removing the way from the relation(s) may render it/them invalid.
The way contains nodes outside of the downloaded area and cannot be deleted without creating an inconsistent state. Download the whole way first before retrying.
You are about to delete a node that is a member of one or more relations. Removing the node from the relation(s) may render it/them invalid.
Show camera icon on action bar
Generate notifications for data with problems or notes
The maximum distance a problem or note can be from the current position to generate a notification
Do not draw a way thicker than this
Total size of tile cache in MB
Displays data statistics and frames/sec in the lower left corner.
Displays the area where an element can be selected.
Do not turn the screen off to save power.
Close changesets by default on save
Type of scale displayed on map.
You can set a non-standard API URL here. Usually should not be changed!
URL for the imagery offset server
Add and enable JOSM compatible presets
Show the icon of the best-matching preset above nodes.
Show the icon of best-matching preset above buildings.
Configuration needed for uploading OSM-Data only if you are not using OAuth. Accounts are available at http://www.openstreetmap.org/user/new
Do not mistake it for the Wiki password. Remember: It is stored and transmitted in plain-text!
The minimum distance interval for GPS notifications, in meters (float). Lower value cause more battery usage.
The minimum time interval for GPS notifications, in milliseconds. Lower value cause more battery usage.
Always show the context menu in EasyEdit mode if the selection is ambiguous.
Set style and visibility of elements
Use the back key for undo in the main edit view
Provide large area for dragging nodes
Radius (m) of externally triggered downloads, 0 = center on map only.
Limit (in km/h) above which auto-download is suspended
Limit (in km/h) above which notes/bugs auto-download is suspended
Select which elements are displayed on the notes/bug layer
Turn on suggestions for the name tag
Automatically add preset when name suggestion is selected
Allow split action bar, use is device specific. Requires restart and an Android version >= 4.0
Address of TCP NMEA source as host:port
Don\'t ask user to turn GPS on if it is disabled
Where the "follow GPS" button will be positioned
Maximum number of inline values displayed in tag form
Maximum number of threads for downloading tiles
Maximum number of displayed notifications per type
Time to wait in seconds before auto-locking, 0 disables.
If set non-downloaded areas will be dimmed in locked mode
Add, edit, delete geocoders for the search functionality
The preset file could not be downloaded. The preset will not work.
The preset file is invalid. The preset will not work.
The preset file was successfully downloaded. However, some icons could not be downloaded and will be missing.
An API with this URL already exists. However, you may add another one (e.g. to switch accounts easily).
The preset used by the API is not available. You should add it first.
The configuration URL does not contain valid data.
Vespucci is recording a GPS track or auto-downloading

Vespucci crashed or found a serious issue the last time it ran.

Please help us by sending an error report, all you have to do is click 'OK'.
Add any further information you believe might help and (optional) your e-mail address if you want feedback.\n\nThank you!
This operation would create a way with too many nodes.
You are about to delete a relation that is a member of one or more relations. Removing the relation from the relation(s) may render it/them invalid.
You are about to delete this element from a relation.
